com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave

Class MultiSlaveBuildModeRunnerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave.MultiSlaveBuildModeRunnerFactory

  • public class MultiSlaveBuildModeRunnerFactory
extends Object
    Factory for multi-slave implementations of DistBuildModeRunners.
